mapper.select: select t1.id , t1.acceptance_id , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.furniture_name , t1.furniture_category , t1.manufacturer_id , t1.guarantee_period , t1.guarantee_date , t1.furniture_spec , t1.position_id , t1.check_num , t1.unit_price , t1.total_price , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 , t1.attribute_15 , t1.attribute_16 , t1.attribute_17 , t1.attribute_18 , t1.attribute_19 , t1.attribute_20 from assets_fur_acceptance_rel t1 where t1.acceptance_id = #{pid}

select t1.id , t1.acceptance_id , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.furniture_name , t1.furniture_category , t1.manufacturer_id , t1.guarantee_period , t1.guarantee_date , t1.furniture_spec , t1.position_id , t1.check_num , t1.unit_price , t1.total_price , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 , t1.attribute_15 , t1.attribute_16 , t1.attribute_17 , t1.attribute_18 , t1.attribute_19 , t1.attribute_20 from assets_fur_acceptance_rel t1
and t1.ID =#{bean.id}
and t1.ACCEPTANCE_ID =#{bean.acceptanceId}
and t1.CREATED_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdBy}),'%')
and t1.CREATION_DATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.creationDate}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATED_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdatedBy}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_DATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdateDate}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_IP like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdateIp}),'%')
and t1.VERSION like concat(concat('%',#{bean.version}),'%')
and t1.FURNITURE_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{bean.furnitureName}),'%')
and t1.FURNITURE_CATEGORY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.furnitureCategory}),'%')
and t1.MANUFACTURER_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.manufacturerId}),'%')
and t1.GUARANTEE_PERIOD like concat(concat('%',#{bean.guaranteePeriod}),'%')
and t1.GUARANTEE_DATE >= #{bean.guaranteeDateBegin}
and t1.GUARANTEE_DATE <= #{bean.guaranteeDateEnd}
and t1.FURNITURE_SPEC like concat(concat('%',#{bean.furnitureSpec}),'%')
and t1.POSITION_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.positionId}),'%')
and t1.CHECK_NUM like concat(concat('%',#{bean.checkNum}),'%')
and t1.UNIT_PRICE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.unitPrice}),'%')
and t1.TOTAL_PRICE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.totalPrice}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_01 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute01}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_02 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute02}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_03 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute03}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_04 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute04}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_05 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute05}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_06 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute06}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_07 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute07}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_08 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute08}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_09 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute09}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_10 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute10}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_11 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute11}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_12 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute12}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_13 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute13}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_14 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute14}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_15 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute15}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_16 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute16}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_17 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute17}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_18 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute18}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_19 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute19}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_20 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute20}),'%')
order by ${pOrderBy}
order by t1.creation_date desc

select t1.id , t1.acceptance_id , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.furniture_name , t1.furniture_category , t1.manufacturer_id , t1.guarantee_period , t1.guarantee_date , t1.furniture_spec , t1.position_id , t1.check_num , t1.unit_price , t1.total_price , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 , t1.attribute_15 , t1.attribute_16 , t1.attribute_17 , t1.attribute_18 , t1.attribute_19 , t1.attribute_20 from (select * from assets_fur_acceptance_rel t where t.ACCEPTANCE_ID= #{bean.acceptanceId}) t1

or t1.ATTRIBUTE_20 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute20}),'%')
order by ${pOrderBy}
order by t1.creation_date desc

select t1.id , t1.acceptance_id , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.furniture_name , t1.furniture_category , t1.manufacturer_id , t1.guarantee_period , t1.guarantee_date , t1.furniture_spec , t1.position_id , t1.check_num , t1.unit_price , t1.total_price , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 , t1.attribute_15 , t1.attribute_16 , t1.attribute_17 , t1.attribute_18 , t1.attribute_19 , t1.attribute_20 from assets_fur_acceptance_rel t1 where t1.id = #{id}
